ISSUE.TITLE: Check SubResourceIntegrity
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In order to avoid incorrect SRIs, we should find a way to check the resources that have cdn versions declared. Ex: https://github.com/Dotnet-Boxed/Framework/blob/1fd6ecc5966d820166ca633bc1cefa91bbcb4369/Source/Boxed.AspNetCore.TagHelpers/SubresourceIntegrityTagHelper.cs#L243
